Even though I don't have many hours played, I can say that:

This game is awesome.

If it would have a competitive gamemode, I would definitely make the switch from CS:GO to CS:S .
The community is way better, less 9 year old kids and less toxic people.

I definitely recommend this game for you and your friends. It's worth every cent of the 20 dollars
